thread.title: Recommended for a NYC Visit
thread.title_full: Recommended for a NYC Visit - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York/West 35th Street, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Travelpages33
title: Recommended for a NYC Visit
text:
This hotel was everything that many previous reviewers have stated: convenient, clean, pleasant and affordable. It is tough to find a decent hotel that is not exorbitantly priced in NYC but this hotel manages to provide both service and value. Staff was very friendly and helpful, the rooms clean with enough basic amenities for a comfortable stay. Our room was on the 19th floor and we had fantastic views of the Empire State building. Despite its location, it was relatively quiet. The room was a bit small; if someone sat at the desk - you had a hard time getting by without hitting the bed but that is a very small detail. We walked to many places from this hotel (5th Avenue, The Highline etc.) and we so very pleased with its location. We will definitely stay here on our next visit!
Room Tip: We had a beautiful view of the Empire State Building from room 1907. See more room tips
